title: How to Make a Capuetae

steps.headline: Boil some water.
steps.description: Just enough for a cup of tea.

steps.headline: Simply make yourself a cup of tea.
Add sugar, 2-3 spoons not to spoil the taste!
steps.description: (If you don't usually drink sugar with your tea or coffee, then I recommend you try sugar with this drink! ).

steps.headline: Expect a new color for your drink.
steps.description: The color of your capuetae may alarm you; however, don't be apprehensive to try something new. Add milk and whipped cream if you have any.

text: Boil some water. Just enough for a cup of tea. Simply make yourself a cup of tea.  Add a spoon of cappuccino.  Add sugar, 2-3 spoons not to spoil the taste! (If you don't usually drink sugar with your tea or coffee, then I recommend you try sugar with this drink! ). Expect a new color for your drink. The color of your capuetae may alarm you; however, don't be apprehensive to try something new. Add milk and whipped cream if you have any. Finished.
